name: The Breath of Hekate
description: The presented work is a multi layer piece whose base lies in the photography of architecture. A study which explores the deconstruction of a traditional European fa√ßade such as the Duomo di Milano, intervened by multiple digital softwares. My inspiration and narrative has been industrial techno music as well as re-imagining lighting design which is represented in this piece as lighting beams on top of the building. The intention behind this moving image is to imagine a glitch in our reality.
